articles.author: Adrianna Rodriguez
articles.title: Does Ozempic, Wegovy increase the risk of suicidal thoughts? A new NIH study has answers. - USA TODAY
articles.description: The study is the first analysis on this topic after reports of suicidal thoughts among users drew scrutiny from European and U.S. regulators.
articles.content:
A new study found semaglutide, sold as the popular diabetes and weight loss drugs Ozempic and Wegovy, was not linked to an increased risk of suicidal ideation compared with other weight loss drugs.
